name: the human the beast
description:
choose carefully when to fight someone and who you should or shouldn't kill

use 'w' , 'a' , 's' ,'d' to move. 'c' to purge when bar is full

click on the boss if you want to fight him while in game 'he increases your health'

try not to kill normal human beings 'not everyone comes in harm'

note:

some of the assets were taken from these 2 amazing sites:

https://opengameart.org

http://charas-project.net/
